data.name: Astra: Fading Stars
data.detailed_description:
The universe of Astra: Fading Stars is all brought to life by traditional, 2D, hand drawn animations and surroundings that compose the atmospheric look of the game.

Engage in this action adventure with classic gameplay, daunting enemies and ancient riddles. Explore multilayered secrets, discover hidden truths and gradually reveal the mechanics and the lore of this world.



Game Features

  • Astra Call, an ability springing from your soul. Utilize it to interact with the environment on a variety of situations that come across you.
  • Highly responsive controls that permit flow and precision.
  • Traditionally animated characters and world.
  • Clues are scattered around the world. Connect them to unravel the truth.
  • Collect Astra and use it to upgrade your strength.
  • Meet a variety of species, hostile or not, that react according to your actions.
  • Numerous otherworldly enemies block your path. Among them, dangerous bosses and mini bosses.
  • Multiple scores of original, instrumental music.
  • World randomization, gameplay elements can change on every run.





A rich story unfolds

The past haunts the future. Two opposing forces compete, will your astral soul be strong enough to fight the corruption?


The stars are slowly fading
one less each time
not long until
they're gone
forever

data.short_description: It's you who can make a change. Use your soul to fight the corruption that leaks in the mysterious and atmospheric universe of Astra. Dive deeply into the essence of this world and navigate around danger leaning on truths and secrets. The Stars are Fading! Soon the darkness will swallow them all.
